name: DRAGOON (WHUMPUS WU)
description:
DRAGOOOOON : A chill and head-scratching game

Jump into this student mobile game made in two weeks about an infinitely long dragon trying to collect laterns ! 
From a relaxing casual experience to challenging puzzle levels, DRAGOOOON lets you move and climb around on colorful environments ! 

This game is currently composed of 10 levels of varying diffculty with 3 differents themes. 

Controls

Swipe in the up/right/down/left directions to move in the desired direction, these controls cover the climbing as well. You can spin the level using buttons on each side.

The Team 

Dragooooon is made by a team of artists, game designers and developers, working hand in hand to give you the best experience possible !

Chloé Hecquefeuille : Concepts, Texturing, level art

Mathilde Kerckhove : 3d artist , ui artist , sound designer  ,level art,texturing

Sebastien Lambert : 3d artist, level art, texturing

Athénaïs Gregori : 3d artist , level art, texturing

Nicolas Gruszecki : Puzzle and mechanics design, level art assistant

Thomas Vignes : Developer
